name: Kid Tripp
overview: Run and jump your way through 20 levels of intense platforming madness in this tough-as-nails platformer! Have you got what it takes to help Kid Tripp escape? • Super challenging, fast paced platforming action. • Elegant controls: tap on the left to jump, tap on the right to throw a rock, and hold down on the right to sprint. • Silky smooth 60 frames per second. • Twenty levels, four awesome worlds. • Old school soundtrack from Chris Kukla. • Game Center leaderboards and achievements.
